objectives.name: 1. Purchase the Falling Star Quest License from the Wizard's Vault.
2. Speak with Field Archivist Cierle in Lowland Shore.
3. Interview local scouts about the unusual sight.
5. Return to Field Archivist Cierle to report about what you've found.
6. Ask Morgaah Bloodseeker in the Black Citadel about crafting a specialized glove.

objectives.hint: Purchased from Guiding Breath at the Harvest Den renown heart in Lowland Shore.
objectives.name: 6.1. Warclaw-Fur Liner

objectives.hint: Purchased from Shading Willow at the Autumn's Vale renown heart in Lowland Shore.
objectives.name: 6.2. Refined Tempering Oil

objectives.hint: Purchased from Vast Caldera at the Coursing Upland renown heart in Lowland Shore.
objectives.name: 6.3. Crystalline Diode

objectives.hint: Purchased from Sava Quicksnarl at the Amduat Point renown heart in Fireheart Rise.
objectives.name: 6.4. Flame Legion Darksteel

objectives.hint: Purchased from Zara at the Gallant's Folly renown heart in Mount Maelstrom.
objectives.name: 6.5. Salvaged Grade 37 Crystalink Coupling

objectives.hint: Purchased from Magister Kathryn at the Tribulation Rift renown heart in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
objectives.name: 6.6. Dredge Heat-Ablation Plates
7. Speak with Morgaah Bloodseeker to craft the glove.

objectives.hint: You can simply transmute the look of your existing gloves.
objectives.name: 8. With the Meteor-Wielder's Glove equipped, retrieve the spear.
9. Return to Field Archivist Cierle to report about the spear.
